name: Brain-Training - Improve your reactions!
description:
Brain-Training is an action puzzle game, which tests and trains your reactions and dexterity. Complete sets of three actions before the time runs out!
Move blocks with arrows, tap blocks with dots and sort blocks with squares on them. Do you think your brain has what it takes to quickly register new situations and react accordingly? The better you get, the harder the game becomes, so you'll never stop training your reactions.
